text: SMSC may refer to: * Seoul Metro (Seoul Metropolitan Subway Corporation) * Shakopee Mdewakanton Sioux Community, a federally recognized tribe of Dakota people in Minnesota * Short message service center * Southwest Minnesota State College, now a university * Spiritual, moral, social and cultural development, provided in schools through the National Curriculum for England. * Standard Microsystems Corporation, a company acquired by Microchip Technology * Smithsonian-Mason School of Conservation, a partnership between George Mason University and the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute
title: SMSC
